sentences.en: 'Am I not?'Mr. Lorry opened his hands, and extended them outwards with an argumentative smile.
sentences.cn: “ 难道我见过你 么 ? ” 罗瑞张开两臂,摊开了双手, 带着争辩的微笑.

sentences.en: Does that window open inwards or outwards?
sentences.cn: 那个窗户是向里开,还是向外开?

sentences.en: Does the window open inwards or outwards?
sentences.cn: 这窗户是朝里开的还是朝外开的?

sentences.en: Does this door open inwards or outwards?
sentences.cn: 这门朝里开还是朝外开?

sentences.en: He placed his guns in the cave pointing outwards.
sentences.cn: 他把枪管放在洞里枪口朝外.

sentences.en: In lapping up a fur, they always put the inner side outwards.
sentences.cn: 卷毛皮时, 他们总是让内层朝外.

sentences.en: Pump this put and flow outwards in being high - efficient.
sentences.cn: 该泵高效内置并且向外流动.

sentences.en: The homes were pushed outwards even at the cost of the discomfort of commuting.
sentences.cn: 不少家庭甚至不惜忍受往返的不便,把家往城外搬.

sentences.en: The sides of a cardboard carton of milk will often curve outwards.
sentences.cn: 装牛奶的硬纸盒壁常常向外弯曲.

sentences.en: The smoke increased, sifted, rolled outwards.
sentences.cn: 烟正在扩大, 它泄漏出来, 滚滚朝外.

sentences.en: We can only spread our knowledge outwards from individual to individual, generation after generation.
sentences.cn: 我们只能把我们的思想通过个人传播开去, 通过一代传一代传下去.

sentences.en: Wound from in outwards daub by mercurochrome, dry, don't dip in water.
sentences.cn: 在伤口处由里向外涂抹红药水, 晾干, 不要沾水.

words.tran_cn: 向外的；外面的；公开的；外服的；肉体的
向外（等于outwards）；在外；显而易见地

phrases.tran_cn: 单程旅行；国外旅行；出航

trans.tran_en: towards the outside or away from the centre of something
